meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Russia, equal to one hundredth of a ruble.
meanings.sent1: In Russia, you can buy candies with a kapeyka.
meanings.sent2: I found a kapeyka on the street today.
meanings.sent3: The kapeyka rolled away, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare as a shiny kapeyka.
meanings.sent5: The kapeyka sparkled in the sunlight, a tiny treasure.

meanings.definition: A small Russian coin, worth one hundredth of a ruble.
meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me a kapeyka for good luck.
meanings.sent2: I saved every kapeyka to buy a toy.
meanings.sent3: The cat batted the kapeyka around the room.
meanings.sent4: His eyes gleamed like a polished kapeyka.
meanings.sent5: The kapeyka chimed as it dropped into the piggy bank.
